meanings.definition: A type of unleavened bread made from wheat flour
meanings.sent1: My mom made delicious poori for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served hot poori with spicy curry.
meanings.sent3: The poori danced in the frying pan as it puffed up.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly cooked poori filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: I could smell the warm poori from across the room.

meanings.definition: A deep-fried bread typically served in Indian cuisine
meanings.sent1: I love the crispy texture of poori.
meanings.sent2: The street vendor sold piping hot poori with chutney.
meanings.sent3: The poori jumped out of the oil like a little balloon.
meanings.sent4: The golden brown poori glistened under the lights.
meanings.sent5: The sound of sizzling poori made my mouth water.
